title: Upper Delaware Scenic & Recreational River: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility      Physical accessibility is currently limited. Exhibit areas at the Zane Grey Museum, Roebling Bridge Tollhouse, and Narrowsburg Information Center are accessible with assistance only.  The towpaths across the Roebling Bridge have recently been reconstructed and are wheelchair accessible.Some of the Zane Grey novels are available in large-print versions.A state-wide Telecommunications Relay Service is available for people with auditory or speech impairments.New York: Voice 1-800-421-1220 TT/TDD 1-800-662-1220 Pennsylvania: Voice 1-800-654-5988 TT/TDD 1-800-654-5984If you have particular needs, or specific questions about facilities, please contact the park in advance of your visit.
